game.name: Ledge and the Spirit Stone
game.description:
One of the best friends of Ledge has come to him and given him the news about the finding of the treasure chest by several kids. He left home immediately to find out the truth behind this news. When he moves forward and talk to some people, the boy receives surprising views on the topic. A person says that it is found beyond his area and he also doubts about the presence of deadly monsters in that area, whereas other person says that he saw the treasure chest himself, but unable to get it though. 

The boy still continues on his way to achieving the goal of the game. Are you going to give your helping hands to this cute and lovely boy on his tough journey? Join Ledge and the Spirit Stone and help this brave boy to head straight into a path where he will have a number of obstacles to face off! Come and protect him against an evil wizard to save the Spirit Stone! You will see many energy bubbles lying around. Try to collect as many as possible to boost your energy! 

You can trigger foot switches as well as collect energy bubbles by just making a simple move on top of them. Feel free to press A to open up other objects like a treasure chest. Pick up a dagger you find on the way to fend off monsters! Move Left and Right arrow button and Press S to attack your enemies! Try to collect the items dropped from your enemies by pressing A! Keep running until you achieve the goal of this cool HTML5 game! All the best to set a new record in this best adventure games for boys!
